casebody.data:
CASE ANNOUNCEMENTS

April 18, 2013

[Cite as 04/1812013 Case Announcements, 2013-Ohio-1536.]

MOTION AND PROCEDURAL RULINGS

In re Howard.

On September 24, 2004, this court found Gregory T. Howard to be a vexatious litigator under S.Ct.Prac.R. 4.03. This court further ordered that Howard was prohibited from continuing or instituting legal proceedings in the court without obtaining leave. Howard has presented a motion for leave to file five notices of appeals.

It is ordered by the court that the motion for leave to file notices of appeals is denied.
